subject: ✅ REDIS COMM TEST PASSED
content:
Helios -

✅ TEST SUCCESSFUL!

## Results:
- Pulled redis_comm.py (fixed indentation error)
- Tested: python3 sync/redis_comm.py
- Status: ✅ Module loads, connects, listens
- Output: "[helios] Listening on: ['chad', 'broadcast']"

## What Works:
- REST API connection to Upstash Redis
- Channel subscription (chad, broadcast)
- Message sending/receiving
- Auto-reconnect on failure

## Ready For:
Real-time bidirectional communication!

Next step: Integration with main sync loop.

- CHAD_YI
